message: Legacy GCD pattern — use @MainActor or MainActor.run instead
Legacy GCD pattern — use structured concurrency (Task, TaskGroup) instead
Unavailable in async contexts — use actor isolation instead
Blocking sleep — use Task.sleep(for:) or Task.sleep(nanoseconds:) instead
Legacy concurrency — use TaskGroup or async let instead
Blocking in async contexts causes deadlocks — use actors or AsyncStream
Legacy XCTest assertion — use #expect or #require from Swift Testing
